item.description:
Come join us and take a trip back in time to the Connecticut Rennaissance Faire.

Join us for a fun group trip during the beautiful fall foliage, and experience life in Medieval times.
There will be live entertainment, music, good food, jousting Knights, and over one hundred
merchants selling wares of all kinds! Dress in period clothing, or just for comfort!

You can check out the website for the Connecticut Renn Faire at:

http://www.ctfaire.co...

We will be meeting at the gate at 11:30-
If you want to go earlier, you can, and then just meet those who are showing up later at
the gate :)
item.name: Back in Time to the Rennaissance Faire!
